title: Number of visitors to Zion National Park in the U.S. 2008 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of visitors in millions, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2013.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from 2013 to 2010.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2019 to 2017.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2010 to 2008.
gold: The number of visitors to Zion National Park has been increasing in recent years . In 2019 , the park saw an increase in the number of visitors with 4.49 million visitors , compared to previous year 's 4.32 million . Zion National Park is located in Utah in the United States .
